TextBody:
Hello Lukas,

I trust all is well with you.

The Netwrix Support team have received a request to optimize the Endpoint Protector Server Appliance which you have deployed.

The recommended resources for 12,000 endpoint are as follows:

	16 Core CPU
	56 GB RAM
	4 TB HDD

Please allocate the recommended resources and inform us when this action is completed.  If you have already allocated the recommended resources then we may go ahead and schedule a remote session to perform the procedure to optimize your Endpoint Protector Server Appliance.

Can we schedule a remote session for next week Wednesday, 4th December at 10 AM Berlin time? kindly confirm your availability for this time.



Kind regards
__________________
André Le Roux | Technical Support Engineer
Endpoint Protector by CoSoSys, now part of Netwrix
DLP | Device Control | Content Aware Protection | eDiscovery | Enforced Encryption
www.endpointprotector.com

This Email may contain confidential information. Not to be disclosed to third parties without prior written approval.

Mit freundlichen Grüßen
Andre Hegel
